DESCRIPTION: Fish are Colorless #b0 cost cards that confer a bonus effect, draw a card, and #yExhaust.
Effect triggers only if you drew this card during your turn, outside of the opening draw.
Effect triggers only if this card is the only one in your hand.
When you complete a #yQuest, obtain its associated #yReward. NL If you already have that #yQuest in progress, draw a card instead.
A Zapped foe loses HP each time it is attacked.
Potency increases the effectiveness of X on cards.
Approx. #b1 in #b4 card rewards contain a Foil card. NL #gShiny!
